Name: 御剑三国-迷雾战争新三国
About the game: Historical Names Will Be restored to the Extreme According to the real historical records, the game restores the outstanding demeanor of 100 military generals of the Three Kingdoms with exquisite vertical drawings and historical settings. Zhao Yun, the silver armor General of Changbanpo, and Lu Bu, the unparalleled God of the Three Kingdoms The famous generals of the classic Three Kingdoms helped to expand the territory, compete in the Central Plains and become a king of a generation! Arrange Troops and Make Arrangements Step By Step In the game, various fortifications can be built freely, including resource collection, scientific research development, military general strengthening, and soldier training Let the road of growth no longer be single Every step of upgrading and matching determines the success or failure of the war. Players will start from the details, step by step, and draw their own map of the Three Kingdoms! Strategic Collocation Of Shangbing Attack The game is set up with four arms, infantry, archers, cavalry and counselors. The four arms restrain each other and complement each other. Free array arrangement, the position of every military general and the collocation of every lineup will affect the development of the war situation! Brain collision, so that wisdom and strategy get the most extreme display! Wide Map Free Gallop More than 3million shags restore the real battlefield of the Three Kingdoms, with many generals and powerful forces; Ba and Shu soldiers started in Jingzhou, and the territory was rich; Jiangdong is located in the natural danger of the Yangtze River and on the side of fuze. The three forces choose freely, expand their territory freely, build cities, and create their own fertile land on the vast territory!
Publishers: 创新策略国战，短赛季极速征战
